statements: SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, age FROM Students WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT student_id, student_name, age, gender FROM Students WHERE age > 20 AND completion_status = True;
SELECT student_name, course_enrolled FROM Students WHERE course_enrolled LIKE '%Science%';
SELECT student_id, student_name, course_enrolled, completion_status FROM Students WHERE completion_status = False;
SELECT student_name, age, gender FROM Students WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE course_enrolled = 'Computer Science' AND completion_status = TRUE ORDER BY student_name ASC
SELECT student_name, age, gender, course_enrolled FROM Students ORDER BY age ASC, student_name DESC
SELECT student_id, student_name, completion_status FROM Students WHERE gender = 'Female' OR age BETWEEN 18 AND 25 ORDER BY student_id
SELECT student_name, age, completion_status FROM Students WHERE age > 25 AND (course_enrolled = 'Engineering' OR course_enrolled = 'Mathematics') ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT * FROM StudentPerformance WHERE completion_status = true;
SELECT student_id, grade FROM StudentPerformance WHERE grade >= 80;
SELECT course_id, completion_status FROM StudentPerformance WHERE completion_status = false;
SELECT * FROM CourseCompletionRates WHERE completion_rate > 0.8;
SELECT course_id, completion_rate FROM CourseCompletionRates ORDER BY completion_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM StudentPerformance WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT student_id, grade FROM StudentPerformance WHERE grade > 80 ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT course_id, AVG(grade) AS avg_grade FROM StudentPerformance GROUP BY course_id;
SELECT course_id, completion_rate FROM CourseCompletionRates WHERE completion_rate < 0.75;
SELECT sp.student_id, ccr.completion_rate FROM StudentPerformance sp JOIN CourseCompletionRates ccr ON sp.course_id = ccr.course_id;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT course_name, course_credits FROM Courses WHERE course_credits > 3;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_credits FROM Courses WHERE course_credits BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_grade FROM Students WHERE student_grade < 80;
SELECT * FROM Students ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_id FROM Students WHERE student_grade > 80;
SELECT course_name, course_credits FROM Courses WHERE course_credits BETWEEN 3 AND 5;
SELECT Students.student_name, Courses.course_name FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id;

SELECT student_name AS Name, SUM(course_credits) AS TotalCredits FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id GROUP BY student_name HAVING SUM(course_credits) > 10;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_age FROM students WHERE student_age > 20;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM students JOIN enrollment ON students.student_id = enrollment.student_id JOIN courses ON enrollment.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_age > 20 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM students WHERE student_age >= 18 AND student_grade='A' ORDER BY student_grade;
SELECT course_name, course_duration FROM courses WHERE course_duration < 6;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM students JOIN enrollment ON students.student_id = enrollment.student_id JOIN courses ON enrollment.course_id = courses.course_id;

SELECT student_name, course_name, report_content FROM students JOIN reports ON students.student_id = reports.student_id JOIN courses ON reports.course_id = courses.course_id ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM Students ORDER BY student_grade DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_end_date FROM Courses WHERE course_start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_name, grade_value FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id;
SELECT student_name, course_name, completion_status FROM Students JOIN Reports ON Students.student_id = Reports.student_id ORDER BY student_name ASC, completion_status DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM Students WHERE student_grade > 90;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM Students INNER JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id INNER JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT student_name FROM Students WHERE student_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT student_id, COUNT(course_id) AS course_count FROM Enrollments GROUP BY student_id HAVING COUNT(course_id) > 3;
